title: Hashing Feature Transformation
description: This lab demonstrates how to use hashing feature transformation using totally random trees to map data to a high-dimensional, sparse representation that may be useful for classification. The mapping is entirely unsupervised and very efficient.

meta.title: Hashing Feature Transformation for Efficient Classification
meta.description: Learn how to use hashing feature transformation with random trees to map data to a high-dimensional, sparse representation for classification tasks.
meta.keywords: unsupervised mapping, machine learning, hashing feature transformation, classification, random trees, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground
